extendedInfo.description: The first women's lacrosse, graphical statistics taking mobile application for your Android powered device!Take individual or team statistics during the game, then save and email them along with a virtual field of where the stats took place.Want your fans to follow along at home?  Connect GameDay Stats - W to your Twitter account and it will tweet the stats real-time, right as they happen!Great for coaches and fans who want to know WHEN and WHERE the action is!Upload a team roster for even more detailed stat keeping.Perfect for Android based tablets!!**Make sure to check out GameDay Stats for men too!**

reviews.title: A port of the men\'s app that fails in critical areas
reviews.comment: Clearly a port of the associated app for the men\'s game with only a different field graphic for the women\'s game.  This tool lacks support for tracking free position shots, free position goals and caused turnovers all critical stats in the womens game.  I gave the app two stars because it can be useful for a parent that simply wants to see how little Jane is doing statistically without worrying about knockouts for FPS or FPG.  Disappointed.
reviews.author: Rom Elwell

reviews.title: Crafty GLAXin
reviews.comment: Kudos for being the only one out there with an APP for girls lacrosse.  Love the ability to be able to live tweet STATs and scores of the game.  Not a huge fan of how quickly you can get out of the program and you lose all your data.  Would be nice to email a map of the hot spots for ground balls and goalie saves.  Would also be nice to keep track of Free Position Shots and small fouls that happen along the way.  Five stars for supporting GLAX.
reviews.author: Mark Lackey
